alert.note: Alert for Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 5:47AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Aransas, Calhoun and northeastern Refugio Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 547 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from Magnolia Beach to near Long Mott. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Lavaca, Seadrift, Port Oconnor, Point Comfort, Alamo Beach, Indianola, Magnolia Beach, Schicke Point, Long Mott, Olivia, Green Lake, Port Alto, Tivoli, Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, Matagorda Island State Park and Austwell. This includes US Highway 87 between mile markers 834 and 840. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio
